block.para: Shows how to use &POLlong; and Tkinter to create a lip-sync application that displays an animated face speaking along with the speech synthesized by &POL;. Lip-sync is accomplished by requesting a list of visemes from &POL; that match up with the synthesized speech.

listitem.para: Get voice metadata from &POL; and display it in a Tkinter application.
Get synthesized speech audio and matching viseme speech marks from &POL;.
Play the audio with synchronized mouth movements in an animated face.
Submit asynchronous synthesis tasks for long texts and retrieve the output from an &S3long; (&S3;) bucket.

block.para: For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
